visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a 3D column chart with the following specifications: The chart type should be 'column', the title should be 'Monthly Sales Data', the axes and labels should have specific styling with a dark blue color for the title, a font size of 14px for the labels, and a font size of 12px for the axes. The data series should include monthly sales data for the year, with each month as a category on the x-axis and the sales figures as the data points. The series should have a custom color palette of ['#008FFB', '#00E396', '#FEB019', '#FF4560', '#775DD0']. Additional configurations should include a white background for the chart, a legend positioned at the bottom, and a margin of 50 pixels around the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a 3D column chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'column', and it includes 3D effects with an alpha and beta angle of 15 degrees and a depth of 50 pixels. The title of the chart is 'Monthly Sales Data', styled with a dark blue color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a font size of 12px. The data series represents monthly sales data for the year, with each month as a category on the x-axis and corresponding sales figures as data points. The series uses a custom color palette to differentiate the columns. The chart has a white background, a legend positioned at the bottom, and a margin of 50 pixels around the chart to ensure it is displayed clearly within its container.
